File main.cpp

check for root user id disabled during development. Remember to enable it before release.

If the ruleset is passed on the command line then don't start the gui but run the ruleset. This will mean that the application can be started from a shell script thus making it possible to deploy it from the init.d start up process or /etc/network/if-pre-up.d
